Detailed Description

The Kohonen map.

This is a ONE dimension self-organizing map.

Remarks:
Implemented simply as an array.

Field Documentation

long PIZKohonenMap::mapSize

Number of nodes in the Kohonen map.

long PIZKohonenMap::vectorSize

Size of node's vector.

long PIZKohonenMap::count

Number of learning iterations performed.

long PIZKohonenMap::range

Neighborhood influence.

long PIZKohonenMap::training

Number of learning iterations planned.

double PIZKohonenMap::step

Learning step.

double* PIZKohonenMap::map

The data.
